workshop.title: Upgrade To Cloud: Oracle Autonomous Integration Cloud (OIC) SaaS Integration with EBS Hands-on Workshop

labs.title: Home
labs.description: Welcome to the OIC Fusion SaaS Integration Workshop

labs.title: Lab 100: Exploring Oracle Integration Cloud
labs.description: This lab will expose you to the functionality in OIC Integration.

labs.title: Lab 200: Basic OIC Development (Hello World Integration
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to build a 'hello world' echo service.

labs.title: Lab 300A: HCM and EBS Integaration
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to review the configuration steps on Fusion SaaS applications HCM and EBS to enable connectivity through OIC Fusion SaaS Adapters.

labs.title: Lab 300B: EBS Connection
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to review the configuration steps on Fusion SaaS applications HCM and EBS to enable connectivity through OIC Fusion SaaS Adapters.

labs.title: Lab 400:  Run Scheduled Integration between HCM and EBS
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to run the Scheduled Integrating that was built in Lab300A and Lab300B.
